css.blockScreen: .block-screen { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: radial-gradient(circle at center, #1e293b 0%, #0f172a 100%); z-index: 10000; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: 20px; }
css.blockCard: .block-card { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05); backdrop-filter: blur(16px); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1); border-radius: 24px; padding: 40px 32px; text-align: center; max-width: 420px; width: 100%; }
css.blockIcon: .block-icon { width: 80px; height: 80px; background: rgba(239,68,68,0.1); border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; margin: 0 auto 24px; border: 1px solid rgba(239,68,68,0.2); }
css.demoTimer: .demo-timer { position: fixed; top: 16px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); background: rgba(245,158,11,0.2); border: 1px solid rgba(245,158,11,0.4); color: #fcd34d; padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 999px; font-size: 0.85rem; font-weight: 600; z-index: 9999; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; }
css.demoTimerUrgent: .demo-timer.urgent { color: #ef4444; background: rgba(239,68,68,0.2); border-color: rgba(239,68,68,0.4); animation: pulse-red 1s infinite; }
css.cooldownOverlay: .cooldown-overlay { position: absolute; inset: 0; background: rgba(15,23,42,0.95); border-radius: inherit; display: none; align-items: center; justify-content: center; text-align: center; padding: 14px; } .cooldown-overlay.show { display: flex; }
css.toast: .toast { background: rgba(30,41,59,0.95); color: white; padding: 12px 20px; border-radius: 50px; font-size: 0.9rem; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; } .toast.warning { border-color: rgba(245,158,11,0.5); color: #fcd34d; } .toast.error { border-color: rgba(239,68,68,0.5); color: #fca5a5; } .toast.success { border-color: rgba(34,197,94,0.5); color: #86efac; }

script.validation: function validateLicense(key) { if (!key) return { valid: false, type: 'empty' }; const trimmedKey = key.trim(); if (trimmedKey === 'DEMO-VALID-KEY') return { valid: true, type: 'demo' }; if (/^[A-Z0-9@#$%&*\-_+=!?]{28}$/.test(trimmedKey)) return { valid: true, type: 'full' }; return { valid: false, type: 'invalid' }; }
script.demoTimer:
function initDemoMode() { const timerDisplay = document.getElementById('demoTimerDisplay'); const timerText = document.getElementById('demoTimerText'); const overlay = document.getElementById('cooldownOverlay'); const submitBtn = document.getElementById('submitBtn'); timerDisplay.classList.remove('hidden'); let countdown = 15; let isRecovering = false; timerText.textContent = 'DEMO MODE: ' + countdown + 's'; showToast('DEMO MODE ACTIVATED', 'warning'); setInterval(function() { countdown--; if (isRecovering) { timerText.textContent = 'RECOVERING: ' + countdown + 's'; timerDisplay.classList.add('urgent'); if (!overlay.classList.contains('show')) { overlay.classList.add('show'); document.querySelector('.cooldown-text').innerHTML = 'Mode Demo: Sedang cooling down...
Hubungi admin untuk license key valid'; submitBtn.disabled = true; } } else { timerText.textContent = 'DEMO MODE: ' + countdown + 's'; timerDisplay.classList.remove('urgent'); if (countdown <= 3) timerDisplay.classList.add('urgent'); if (overlay.classList.contains('show')) { overlay.classList.remove('show'); submitBtn.disabled = false; } } if (countdown <= 0) { isRecovering = !isRecovering; countdown = isRecovering ? 60 : 15; showToast(isRecovering ? 'DEMO LIMIT: Recovering...' : 'DEMO READY', isRecovering ? 'error' : 'success'); } }, 1000); }
script.toast: function showToast(message, type) { const container = document.getElementById('toastContainer'); if (!container) return; const toast = document.createElement('div'); toast.className = 'toast ' + (type || 'error'); toast.innerHTML = '' + message + ''; container.appendChild(toast); setTimeout(function() { toast.remove(); }, 4000); }
script.init: function initLicenseCheck() { const licenseKey = (typeof BUYER_CONFIG !== 'undefined' && BUYER_CONFIG.licenseKey) ? BUYER_CONFIG.licenseKey : ''; const result = validateLicense(licenseKey); if (result.valid) { if (result.type === 'demo') { initDemoMode(); } document.getElementById('mainContent').classList.remove('hidden'); document.getElementById('blockScreen').classList.add('hidden'); } else { document.getElementById('blockScreen').classList.remove('hidden'); document.getElementById('mainContent').classList.add('hidden'); } }

usage.configExample: var BUYER_CONFIG = { licenseKey: 'DEMO-VALID-KEY', businessName: 'MyHotspot', loginMode: 1, enableNetflix: 0 };
notes: Gunakan 'DEMO-VALID-KEY' untuk mode demo dengan timer 15 detik aktif, 60 detik cooldown
License key valid harus 28 karakter dengan format: A-Z, 0-9, @#$%&*-_+=!?
Jika key tidak valid, akan muncul block screen dengan pesan 'Akses Ditolak'
Tambahkan script validation ke setiap halaman HTML yang perlu dilindungi
